transcript.title: Visit by the Crown Prince of Thailand
transcript.content:
22 September 1988

The Crown Prince of Thailand, His. Royal Highness Maha Vajiralongkorn, will visit Australia as a guest of the Australian Government from 25-28 September. His Royal Highness will be Thailand's official representative at the Thai National Day at EXPO on 26 September. He will also make a private visit to Hobart and Canberra from 28 September to 4 October where he will be the guest of the Governor of Tasmania and the Governor-General respectively.
